name: Sonic Jam
overview: Sonic overload! Buckle-up for a jam-packed, SuperSonic spectacular! You get all four Hedgehog hits on one blistering CD! The original Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic 2, Sonic 3, and Sonic & Knuckles, the game that transforms Sonic 1, 2 and 3 into all new adventures! If that's not enough to satisfy your need for fun, explore the completely new, fully interactive 3D Sonic Museum.
